String.string: Go to Meren in Velika Headquarters and check the lost and found.
Use Personal Teleport Scroll: Jovin to teleport to Arun Heights. [Press to open your inventory and select Personal Teleport Scroll: Jovin.]
Defeat Brutal Naga Battlemaster, Brutal Iron Giant, and Brutal Onyx Hydrath to charge the Dimension Stabilizer.

Remove the time distortions.
[Press F near the Time Distortions.]
Return to Jovin in the Arun Heights.
Tell Meren you could not find the pendant's owner.
